A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home. Finding himself lost and alone at Paddington Station, he meets the kindly Brown family, who offer him a temporary haven.

Director: Paul King
Writers: Paul King, Hamish McColl (screen story)
Stars: Hugh Bonneville, Sally Hawkins, Julie Walters
Genres: Comedy | Family
Country: UK | France
Language: English


Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time


Source:

Video: Unsubbed 720p Korean VOD
Audio: English good cam or bad line from Subbed 720p Korean VOD
thx

Notes:

well that was a pita, combining the best of two so different files together to get one perfect one, took me 2 days
there are 2 different Korean Videos

Video 1: Hardcoded Korean Subs    with English good cam or bad line audio with 24 frames with runtime 1h26
Video 2: Non-Subbed Korean Video with Korean Studio audio with 30 frames with runtime 1h35

You cant speedup audio that much and you cant slow down video that much without getting it jerky, 
had to do a workaround and find a common Videoframerate (25frames in this case) for both Video and Audio without getting jerky video.
So NO Video has been cut out and NO Audio has been removed or added, all is untouched
combined framerate is now 25 frames and runtime in the middle 1h31, its all there

Encode:

for the Video i fixed rgb and added sharpness
the Audio eventhough its called studio audio isnt the best, sounds more like a line, tried cleaning it, not much to improve

still got very nice and will do me till retail

enjoy

Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1800 2pass
Audio: English AC3 2.0 Stereo
Sample: yes included

PS: 720p too later,if i can get it to work
